attributes.additional_details: I can not believe that with over 80,000 official deaths and the massive destruction to the economy, that this government is not implementing a 24/7 /365 roll out of vaccination. Surely the quicker we can open business and society the better .
attributes.background: Government have said that 24/7 365 days a year vaccinations will only be considered if there is a clamour for one. I want to start a clamour!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
